comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: A gentleman we know only as 'Jack Chiarmonte' (from the photo's inscription) poses with "Zack-ass," an unidentifed P-38 assigned to the 36th Fighter Squadron, 8th FG, shows evidence of previous assignment, by way of the over-painted "146" on the nose, to the 432nd FIghter Squadron of the 475th FG.

comment.author: 89986708@N06
comment._content: P-38H "Zack-ass" #146 of 432nd FS/475th FG previously flown by Capt. Zack W. Dean, after transfering to 35th FS/8th FG.
